title: Maven Plugin create problem since 3.0.0.CR1
body:
### Describe the bug

```
mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.0.0.CR2:create -DbuildTool=gradle -DoutputDirectory=test -DplatformVersion=3.0.0.CR2 -Dextensions="resteasy-reactive"
```

The problem occurs with 3.0.0.CR1 and 3.0.0.CR2. No problem with 3.0.0.Beta1.
I mean the plugin version.

```
E:\Quarkus\templates>mvn io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.0.0.CR2:create -DbuildTool=gradle -DoutputDirectory=test -DplatformVersion=3.0.0.CR2 -Dextensions="resteasy-reactive"
```
